backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Cancellation of Request to Amend the Zoning By-law - 123 Bellamy Road North

noticeDescription:
Please be advised, this Notice has been published online due to a Canada Post Labour Disruption.

 

CANCELLATION NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING

 

Location of Application: 123 Bellamy Road North

 

Request to Amend the Zoning By-law

Application Number: 24 126134 ESC 21 OZ

Applicant: Hazelview Developments 

 

A Notice of Public Meeting was originally sent on November 14, 2024.  Please be advised that this application will NOT be considered by the Scarborough Community Council on December 6, 2024.

 

This Public Meeting has been CANCELLED.

 

Compliance with Provincial laws respecting Notice may result in you receiving duplicate notices.
title: Notice of Cancellation of Request to Amend the Zoning By-law - 123 Bellamy Road North
topics: Planning > Refusal of application for a Zoning By-law Amendment
